name: snowspeeder-sim
description:
Flight sim remixed from awesome project at https://github.com/YuriyGulyak/RWS

Added freely available 3D models and added "rewind" function for https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-4

Map your controller input in Settings, Control screen.

Press spacebar to rewind (single player only).

Fly through the rings to get the best lap time.
